summary.overview: This JCL consolidates transaction data from backup and system transaction files, sorts them by transaction ID, and loads the combined data into a VSAM file for efficient access and retrieval by downstream applications.
business_functions: Combine transaction records from backup transaction file and system transaction file
Sort all consolidated transaction records in ascending order by Transaction ID
Create unified combined transaction dataset with all sorted records
Load combined transaction data into VSAM Key Sequenced Dataset for high-performance online access

COMBTRAN.jcl.program_overview: IBM Sort Utility - Merges and sorts transaction data from multiple sources
IBM Access Method Services - Loads transaction data into VSAM datasets

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Backup Records (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.BKUP(0))
datasource_summary.function: Contains backup transaction records that are processed and combined with other transaction data for consolidation

datasource_summary.name: System Transaction Records (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.SYSTRAN(0))
datasource_summary.function: Contains system transaction records that are processed and combined with backup transaction data for consolidation

datasource_summary.name: Combined Transaction Records (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.COMBINED(+1))
datasource_summary.function: Stores the combined and sorted transaction records from multiple sources, serving as consolidated transaction data for further processing

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Master File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.VSAM.KSDS)
datasource_summary.function: Permanent storage for combined transaction records with indexed access capability for efficient transaction retrieval and processing
